title: Urbanization in Zimbabwe 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: In general Share of urban population in total population has stayed the same over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Share of urban population in total population, about 33.2 was reported at Year 2010
Minimum Share of urban population in total population about 32.21 was reached at Year 2018
min_summary: Overall Share of urban population in total population has decreased over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2018.
